title: Does Flex 3v3 have ranked rewards this season?
body: I really need someone to clarify this for me

replies.body:
You will receive

* An icon 
* A loading screen boarder (Silver +) 
* A profile banner trim (Bronze +) 
* A victorious skin (Gold +)
* Challenger rewards (Challenger tier only)
* And possibly more.
Does a say diamond border in 3v3 get you a diam border in normal 5v5?

I have absolutely no idea. We typically announce ranked rewards towards the end of the season. Since the season has just started, that information probably won't be out for a while. The only announcement I saw mention rewards was the [**2017 Ranked Kickoff**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season), which stated:

> "For 2017, anyone who achieves Gold rank or higher in either Solo/Duo or Flex queue will receive the Victorious skin, along with an extra reward for those who manage the climb in both."

Let me know if you have any questions.
It should give rewards for sure. At least a summoner icon or something like that cause its a really fun queue to play and Riot should encourage other players to play it.

It certainly should! It was like that before wasn't it? 
Please find out and inform us long before the end of season...
I'm wondering if that "Flex queue" includes 3v3 because ranked 3v3 is technically flex queue.
